abstract: William T. Winters, a former top executive at JPMorgan, has teamed up with the investment firms of Jacob Rothschild and Johann Rupert to set up an asset management and advisory firm in London.
snippet: William T. Winters, a former top executive at JPMorgan, has teamed up with the investment firms of Jacob Rothschild and Johann Rupert to set up an asset management and advisory firm in London.
lead_paragraph: William T. Winters, a former senior executive at JPMorgan Chase, has teamed up with the investment firms of Jacob Rothschild and the South African billionaire Johann P. Rupert to set up an asset management and advisory firm in London.

headline.main: Former JPMorgan Executive Starts Advisory Firm
